Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI allowed me to learn at my own pace and in terms that I could understand compared to teachers who often are so overworked that they dont have the time to explain properly or are very vague in their answers due to the risk of "overhelping" a student.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback made me feel like I was competent of doing the task, teachers sometimes make you feel stupid for not knowing things that were previously discussed.
